column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////A group of friends and i came on a friday night
column2: it was quite pack. After 30mins of waiting we finally got seated. The decoration is beautiful
column3: but the tables was not pratical. Most of the tables are design to sit no more than two people. I ordered the cha cha cha ramen
column4: the broth was too overwhelming and there wasnt much meat or veggies in it. For a $14 ramen
column5: i expected more. The chicken nuggets are tender but too oily. The only thing i liked is the tako yagi
